title: Towako
description:
Volume 1:
[spoiler]
1. [774 (Nanashi)] Yupiel-sama no Geboku (Lady Yupiel's Servant)
2. [Akazawa RED] Sewayaki Zashiki-warashi (Meddlesome Zashiki-warashi)
3. [Takatsu] X-Card Frontier! (1)
4. [Amagaeru] Lolibabaa to Mago (Lolibabaa and Grandson)
5. [Batta] Gedou no Ie (Household of Gedou)
6. [Oouso] Hyakunen Shoujo (Centennial Maiden)
7. [Cyocyo] Enkyori Renai (Love Across the Aeons)
8. [BeNantoka] Eien no Wakaba Girl (Eternally Verdant)
9. [Koishi Chikasa] Kinuito no Ude (Silken Arm)
10. [Ogata Zen] Suzuwe-san wa Ryoubo (Dorm Mother Suzuwe-san)
11. [Yumano Yuuki] Natsu Ouse (Midsummer Tryst)
12. [Kinnotama] Tentacle act
13. [Esuo] Licking Monster
14. [Gengorou] Kawaranai Mono (Unchanging)
15. [Miura Yasuto] Hakka Shoujo - Bangaihen (Peppermint Girl - Side Story)
15.5. Authors' notes and background information
15.6. TL notes
[/spoiler]
Volume 2:
[spoiler]
MD can only credit 3 groups but there are 4 that worked on it. 

Raws provided by fynolt2 (for the main volume), and dlfnzy1 (the side material by Kinku)
Translated by CapableScoutMan
Typesetting, redrawing, cleaning, and all sorts of editing by S.T.A.L.K.E.R., B.E.C. Scans and bigk40k

1. [Ogata Zen] Suzuwe-san wa Ryoubo: Aru Hi no Heinichiroku (Dorm Mother Suzuwe-san: One peaceful day)
2. [Ike] Kyuuketsuki to Hoshigatari no Yoru (Discussing the Starlit Sky with a Vampire)
3. [Gengorou] Boku to Sennin-sama (The Xian and I)
4. [Yumano Yuuki] Oshikake Kitsune Yome (The Uninvited Fox Wife)
5. [774 (Nanashi)] Yupiel-sama to no Nichijou (Everyday Life with Lady Yupiel)
6. [BeNantoka] Zom Zom Biyori
7. [Tamano Kedama] Chuu Chuu Drain
8. [Batta] Gedou no Yukari (The Bonds of Gedou)
9. [Oouso] Natsu no Omohide (Memories of Summer)
10. [Amagaeru] Ookeyaki no Kouro (Kouro of the Great Zelkova)
11. [Mudou Eichi] Mechanical Instinct
12. [CyoCyoPolice] Kokoroechigai no Oyome-san (The Imprudent Bride)
13. [Yam] Nekomimi Kaa-san (Nekomommy)
14. [Mutou Mato] Akai Mi Hajiketa (Split the Scarlet Fruit of Dawn)
15. [Koishi Chikasa] Hitokui-sama no Chocolate Cake (The Anthropovore's Chocolate Cake)
16. [Kamen no Hito] Although the lolibabaa understands lolicons, she's desperate to increase her loli appeal because he only goes for actual lolis (1)
16.5. [Kinku] Side material and notes
[/spoiler]
Volume 3:
[spoiler]
1. [Cyocyo] Love Across the Aeons (2)
2. [Ogata Zen] Dorm Mother Suzuwe-San
3. [Kokuesi Roukun] Everlasting Fragrance
4. [Tamano Kedama] Beastie Charm: Chuu Chuu Drain (2)
5. [Gengorou] Kagachi-Sama
6. [Takatsue] X-Card Frontier! (2)
7. [Amagaeru] Welcome to the Youkai Bistro
8. [Yumano Yuuki] The Demon Lord is Level 1
9. [Saryuu] My First Time at the Red (Lolibabaa) Light District
10. [Emons] The Masters Hometown
11. [Batta] Cycle of Gedou
12. [Oouso] Magical Granny Orgasm Chiyo-San
13. [yam] Legend of the Invincible Warashi-Sama!
14. [Mudou Eichi] Sergeant Reboot
15. [Yuzuha] "Lolibabaa tales from Japan-Oni-Slaying Chapter"
16. [Koishi Chikasa] Witch of the Fire Scene - Stem
17. [Kamen No Hito] Although the lolibabaa understands lolicons, she's desperate to increase her loli appeal because he only goes for actual lolis (2)
Omakes: [Miyamarun] Wine for Two
[/spoiler]
Volume 4:
[spoiler]
1. Namake Youko (The Lazy Fox)
2. Lusty Charms - Chuu Chuu Drain 3
3. Lolikko ni eroi koto shitemo babaa nanode hinan sareru iware wa nai yo ne (I can lewd the loli all I want, and nobody can criticise me because she's a grandma)
4. Eisei no Mai Zenpen Part 1(Everlasting Dance Part 1)
5. Lolibabaa ni Aitakatta kara Isekai Tensei Shita (I wanted to meet a lolibabaa, so I got reborn into another world)
6. Freeze!!
7. Tsuzureori (Tapestry)
8. Lamp no Majin (Genie of the Lamp)
9. Youkai Koryouriya ni Youkoso ~Shizuoka Ryokou Hen~ (Welcome to the Youkai Bistro ~Trip to Shizuoka)
10. Ningyou no Oningyou (The Doll's Puppet)
11. Furusato no Tama-baasama (Granny Tama from my Hometown)
12. Devil's Born
13. Witch of the Fire Scene - Bloom
13.5 Kamen no Hito - Story Art
13.6 Bonus
[/spoiler]
